frontmatter.title: Data Science Bootcamp
frontmatter.description: Collection of final projects from data science bootcamp from Yandex Practicum.

pageProps.content:
![banner](/images/projects/yandex-practicum.png) Yandex Practicum is a data science bootcamp that I attended in 2022. The bootcamp is a 9-month long program that covers the basics of data science and machine learning. The program is divided into 3 modules: - Data Preprocessing, - Data Analysis, - Machine Learning. Each module consists of 3-4 projects that tackle close to real-world problems. The projects are evaluated by a team of mentors. The final project is a capstone project that is made for and evaluated by real companies. ## Projects **The project solutions are not shared publicly to prevent plagiarism. To see my solutions, send me a message with your github email.**
Project Description Tools Source
Exploratory Data Analysis Blah blah Python, Pandas, Matplotlib, Seaborn asd
